attributes.action: Bring in the right to buy for 0ver 60s who were unable to buy in the Thatcher years, we would all be better off now had we been allowed this right freeing up many housing benefit applications
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: or build more bungalows for us of 2 beds oe more so when family want to help out they could stay over.Right to buy, same rights for all especially those paying rent the longest
